class.name: Pair

javadoc.text:
Generic pair. *
* Although the instances of this class are immutable, it is impossible * to ensure that the references passed to the constructor will not be * modified by the caller.
Create an entry representing a mapping from the specified key to the * specified value.
javadoc.param: k Key (first element of the pair).
v Value (second element of the pair).

javadoc.text: Create an entry representing the same mapping as the specified entry.

javadoc.return: the key (first element of the pair).
the value (second element of the pair).

javadoc.text: Get the first element of the pair.
javadoc.return: the first element of the pair.

javadoc.text: Get the second element of the pair.
javadoc.return: the second element of the pair.

javadoc.text: Compare the specified object with this entry for equality.
javadoc.return: {@code true} if the given object is also a map entry and * the two entries represent the same mapping.

class.comment:
